mini_description: A responsive admin dashboard built with Tailwind and Flask.
description: Aurora Dashboard is a lightweight admin interface for monitoring application metrics, managing users, and viewing logs. Built with a focus on accessibility and responsive layouts.

mini_description: A personal portfolio template with animations and gallery.
description: Pixel Portfolio showcases projects with a filterable gallery, animated transitions, and contact integration. Ideal for designers and small studios.

mini_description: Prototype e-commerce storefront with cart and checkout flow.
description: ShopSwift is a demo storefront demonstrating product lists, cart management, and a mock Stripe-powered checkout for rapid prototyping.

mini_description: A study scheduler and flashcard app to boost retention.
description: StudyBuddy helps plan study sessions, create spaced-repetition flashcards, and track progress across subjects. Includes export/import functionality.

mini_description: Real-time event listings and RSVP microservice.
description: EventPulse streams live event updates to clients, supports RSVPs, and exposes a REST API for integration with other services.
Lens Lab contains small utilities and demos for image transformations, filters, and basic computer vision experiments.
